plot: A girl, after many years, comes back to her old childhood house. Fragments of the past will leave space to new memories still to be written.
title: Come Foglie
plot_es: A girl, after many years, comes back to her old childhood house. Fragments of the past will leave space to new memories still to be written.
plot_en: A girl, after many years, comes back to her old childhood house. Fragments of the past will leave space to new memories still to be written.
